articles.title: Talks Held between Kim Yong Nam and Indonesian President
articles.content:
Talks Held between Kim Yong Nam and Indonesian President
 Djakarta, May 15 (KCNA-Correspondent) -- Talks between Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, president of the Republic of Indonesia, were held at the Presidential Palace in Djakarta on Tuesday.
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the matter of further expanding and developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and matters of mutual concern and discussed issues of boosting cooperation and solidarity in the international arena.
					
					 The DPRK side said that having the dear respected Kim Jong Un as the supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state in high esteem, it celebrated the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung with splendor and is energetically pushing forward the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 It expressed the will to consolidate the relations between the two countries and boost the cooperation in the economic, cultural, sports, public health and various other fields.
					
					 The Indonesian side said that the two countries have developed the friendly relations on the principle of respect for sovereignty, cooperation and reciprocity, saying that the relations between the two countries have a long historic tradition.
					
					 It stressed that Indonesia would expand multi-faceted cooperation with the DPRK and cooperation in the ASEAN and the NAM.
					
					 The talks proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.
					
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Ri Kwang Gun, chairman of the Commission for Joint Venture and Investment, An Jong Su, minister of Light Industry, Ri Jong Ryul, DPRK ambassador to Indonesia, and other suite members and from the Indonesian side Coordinating Minister for Political, Law and Security Affairs Djoko Suyanto, Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Hatta Radjasa, Coordinating Minister for People's Welfare Agung Lasono, Foreign Minister Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa, Minister of Trade Gita Wirjawwan, Minister of Industry Mohammad Suleman Hidayat, Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Nasri Gustaman, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Senior Officials of Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Senior Officials of Indonesia
 Jakarta, May 15 (KCNA Correspondent) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, who is paying an official goodwill visit to Indonesia, met and had a friendly talk with Vice-President of Indonesia Boediono on Tuesday.
					 Present there were Ri Kwang Gun, chairman of the Commission for Joint Venture and Investment, An Jong Su, minister of Light Industry, Ri Jong Ryul, DPRK ambassador to Indonesia, and other suite members, and Mohammad Umar, secretary of the vice-president, Gita Wirjawwan, minister of Trade, Nasri Gustaman, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and officials concerned.
					
					 The vice-president of Indonesia highly praised the Korean people for having invariably advanced along the road chosen by them under the leadership of HE respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He expressed his willingness to boost the cooperation with the Korean people, long-standing friends of Indonesia.
					
					 On the same day Kim Yong Nam separately had cordial talks with Taufiq Kiemas, speaker of the People's Consultative Assembly of Indonesia, and Marzuki Alie, speaker of the House of People's Representatives of Indonesia.
					
					 Taufiq Kiemas said that the DPRK achieved its development on the basis of its line.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the economic cooperation between the two countries that have long historical relations would grow stronger.
					
					 He also wished HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, good health.
					
					 Marzuki Alie said that it was great pride for the Korean people to have Kim Jong Un at the top post of the party and state.
					
					 He expressed expectation that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Ceremony of Welcoming Kim Yong Nam Held in Indonesia
articles.content:
Ceremony of Welcoming Kim Yong Nam Held in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of welcoming Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, took place at the Presidential Palace in Indonesia on Tuesday.
					 Kim was accompanied by Ri Kwang Gun, chairman of the Commission for Joint Venture and Investment, An Jong Su, minister of Light Industry, Ri Jong Ryul, DPRK ambassador to Indonesia, and other suite members.
					
					 Present there were President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, Coordinating Minister for Political, Law and Security Affairs Djoko Suyanto, Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Hatta Radjasa, Coordinating Minister for People's Welfare Agung Lasono, Foreign Minister Raden Mohammad Marty Muliana Natalegawa, Minister of Defense Purnomo Yusgiantoro, Minister of Trade Gita Wirjawwan, Minister of Industry Mohammad Suleman Hidayat, the commander-in-chief of the Indonesian National Army, the chiefs of Staff of the Army, Navy and the Air Force, the police commander and Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Nasri Gustaman. Kim reviewed a guard of honor of the Indonesian National Army.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Construction Site of Folk Park
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Construction Site of Folk Park
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, Tuesday learned about the progress made in the construction of the Pyongyang Folk Park in the final stage. 
					 The park is associated with the noble intention of the great men of Mt. Paektu to provide the Korean people with better cultural and emotional life while valuing the folk tradition. 
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae learned in detail about the progress made in the construction, going round different construction sites. He encouraged the soldier-builders for their labor achievements for making innovations day by day true to the teachings given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un on the spot.
					
					 He stressed the need to build monumental edifices and models of relics and remains alive and create greenery well.
					
					 He underlined the need for the soldier-builders to complete on the best level the park which was initiated by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and for which the Supreme Commander has shown concern.

articles.title: Japan's Mean Anti-DPRK Mud-slinging under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Mean Anti-DPRK Mud-slinging under Fire 
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on Tuesday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that the Japanese reactionaries are floating a cock-and-bull story about "the abduction of an American" in a bid to mislead the public opinion:
					 These days, an organization of Japan related to the "abduction issue" and right-wing political figures are getting frantic with a poor and mean racket over the DPRK's abduction issue. 
					
					 Yamatani, lawmaker from the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan, at a press conference in Washington on May 10 claimed that an American studying in China who had been reported missing in 2004 might be abducted by the DPRK.
					
					 This is a sheer lie and one more fresh plot hatched against the DPRK.
					
					  In the past the Japanese reactionaries kicked up much fuss after deliberately linking cases of missing persons that took place inside Japan with the DPRK only to be censured and ridiculed by the world people when they turned out to be sheer fabrications.
					
					 Such behavior of the Japanese reactionaries reminds one of the last-ditch efforts of psychopath.
					
					 They are floating the above-said story, linking this or that country with the DPRK, not content with persistently peddling the "abduction issue" which no longer exists after it found its full solution thanks to the sincere efforts of the DPRK. This glaringly shows their anti-DPRK hysteria.
					
					 Whenever the political situation gets unstable in Japan, the right-wing politicians used to kick up such row about the DPRK's abduction in a bid to win clout and tide over their crisis by fanning up national chauvinism and inciting hostility towards it. 
					
					 It is such Japanese politicians as Yamatani on the beck and call of the anti-DPRK organizations to make no scruple of playing the role of a marionette in such base and poor farce if this helps improve his image.
					
					  The world people are spitting at the politicians of Japan who are hell-bent on hypocrisy and plot-breeding, unable to distinguish truth from a lie.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz 
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on May 2.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade,
					
					 Please accept my warm congratulations to you upon your election as first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 I renew the assurances of the highest consideration to you.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back from NAM Ministerial Meeting
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back from NAM Ministerial Meeting 
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK headed by Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, returned home on Tuesday after taking part in the NAM ministerial meeting  in Egypt.

articles.title: Reception Given on Day of China at Trade Fair
articles.content:
Reception Given on Day of China at Trade Fair
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and Weng Rensheng, vice-minister of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade, hosted a reception at Koryo Hotel on Tuesday on the Day of China at the 15th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair. 
					 Present there on invitation were O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and other officials in the field of foreign trade and officials concerned. 
					
					 Present there were the members of the delegation of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade taking part in the fair, Chinese guests and staff members of the Chinese embassy here. 
					
					   Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Remains of Martyr Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Remains of Martyr Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Remains of a martyr were buried in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery.
					 He was KPA General Hong Song Ryul, who performed feats in beefing up the air force of the KPA.
					
					 He displayed his matchless courage in the Fatherland Liberation War in Korea and the liberation struggle of the Vietnamese people.
					
					 In the subsequent period he devoted his all to defending the Songun leadership of the party with arms.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un highly appreciated his feats and made sure that his remains were buried in the Cemetery.
					
					 A burial ceremony took place at the Cemetery on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, servicepersons of the KPA and the bereaved families of the martyr.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Visit Mangyongdae 
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Delegations of different countries and regions taking part in the 15th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair visited Mangyongdae on Tuesday. 
					 They visited the old home of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae where he was born, spent his childhood, cultivating his great will for revolution. They looked round historic relics there, being briefed on the immortal stories about the time-honored house. 
					
					 They had a photo taken before the old home. 
					
					 XuanTao, managing director of the Fuxin Fumian Company of China, said that visit to the old home offered an opportunity to know better about the revolutionary career of the great President. 
					
					It was under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung that the DPRK could develop into a socialist power, he said, adding the exploits the President performed on behalf of the country and its people are great, indeed. 
					
					 Franz Helmut Bramen, manager of the FHB Handels Co. Ltd., Austria, said that whenever visiting Mangyongdae he used to get deeply impressed by it. Words fail to give my impressions, he added. 
					
					 Lai Ruiqin, general director of Kai Lui Co. Ltd., China, said that the President and his family members of Mangyongdae devoted their all to the country and its people. 
					
					 The President embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and defeated the Japanese imperialists and liberated Korea, he said, adding:
					
					 The appearance of the DPRK has changed beyond recognition and its people are full of confidence and optimism.

articles.title: Korean Army and People Full of Confidence in Victory
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid by Japanese and Koreans in Japan to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship and the group of Korean residents in Japan who are visiting their homeland visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il standing on Mansu hill and paid tribute to them on May 15.
					 The members of the delegation and the group presented bouquets and made bows to their statues.
					
					 They arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Expected to Advance into Soccer Quarterfinals of Olympiad: Expert
articles.content:
DPRK Expected to Advance into Soccer Quarterfinals of Olympiad: Expert
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Prof. and Dr. Ri Tong Gyu, a researcher of the Sports Science Institute under the Academy of Sports Science of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, told KCNA that the DPRK women's team is expected to advance into the soccer quarterfinals in the 30th Olympiad.
					 The DPRK team belongs to Group C along with Colombian, French and the U.S. rivals, according to the drawing results released on April 24, said the soccer expert.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 In view of the FIFA's world ranking, some experts regard Group C as a "group of death".
					
					 Our team is to compete with the Colombian rival for the first match of the group round robin.
					
					 Colombia has made a rapid development in women's football in recent years. Its team includes experienced players who took part in women's world cups.
					
					 The French team, which finished fourth in the 2011 Women's World Cup, is excellent in individual skill.
					
					 The U.S. team guns for its fourth title in the Olympic Games. This team is believed to consist of those players who participated in the matches with our team in 2007 and 2011 Women's World Cups.
					
					 The team as a whole is high in terms of skill, but many of its players are near 30 years of age.
					
					 The DPRK team consists of younger players, but it recorded three wins and two draws in five matches at the Asian regional finals for the 30th Olympiad and two wins and one draw in three matches at the China International Women's Soccer Tournament.
					
					 I am sure that our team will advance into the quarterfinals of Olympiad if it displays high spiritual and collective strength in matches.

articles.title: Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Guidelines for Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Guidelines for Korean Revolution
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made public a historic work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on April 6, Juche 101 (2012).
					 In the work he indicated important guidelines for the strengthening and development of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He defined Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guiding ideology of the WPK and declared that to imbue the whole society with Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the highest programme of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK had so far taken Kimilsungism as its guiding ideology. In February 1974 General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and set forth the programme on modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					Kimilsungism is the integral system of idea, theory and method of Juche. 
					
					 The leader developed the President's idea of attaching importance to military affairs into the idea of Songun revolution and theory of Songun politics and advanced the theory of building a thriving socialist nation, remarkably enhancing the attraction and vitality of Kimilsungism.
					
					 That is why the Korean people have long combined Kim Il Sung's idea with Kim Jong Il's, calling them Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and recognizing it as the guiding ideology of the WPK. 
					
					 However the leader sternly prohibited his name from being associated with the guiding ideology of the WPK, saying that nothing would be seen other than Kimilsungism, no matter how one delves into Kimjongilism.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an integral system of the idea, theory and method of Juche, and a great revolutionary ideology representative of the Juche era.
					
					 Modeling the whole society on it is a revolutionary inheritance of the imbuing of the whole society with Kimilsungism and its development onto a new, higher stage.
					
					 Thanks to Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the WPK could lead the Korean revolution only to victory without any error concerning the line.
					
					 The WPK and the Korean people will as ever hold high the great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Slogan Contains Kim Jong Un's Outlook on People
articles.content:
Slogan Contains Kim Jong Un's Outlook on People
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Slogan "Let us do more good things for people!" is now heard everywhere in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 This slogan reflects the dear respected Kim Jong Un's noble intention and strong demand that warmer and more cordial care be shown for the popular masses when they are in hard time, top priority given to ensuring their interests and convenience and the best things provided to them.
					
					 The deep affection for the people, greatest importance to their interests and absolute worship for their strength are his natural disposition.
					
					 From the days when he started his guidance over the Korean People's Army, he has made all affairs of the army serve for the soldiers and people.
					
					Saying that true patriotism is to do good things for the people, he would be very pleased to hear any report that the army helped civilians much.
					
					 The service personnel are now doing good things for the people one after another on a large scale and at one go under the slogan of love for the people.
					
					 An atmosphere of giving top priority to the people's interests and wellbeing and regarding it as absolute has pervaded the whole society while an all-party and nationwide drive to do more good things for the people is dynamically being conducted.
					
					 In the trying period of national mourning or in the present onward march, the Korean people have venerated Kim Jong Un, who has the unshakable faith that the people represents justice and strength as well as the warmest love for them, calling him their father.

articles.title: KCNA Urges U.S. to Mind Its Own Serious Human Rights Issues
articles.content:
KCNA Urges U.S. to Mind Its Own Serious Human Rights Issues
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the State Department of the U.S. recently let loose sophism that the human rights issue is an important element for improving the DPRK-U.S. relations, expressing "concern over the human rights issue of north Korea." 
					 What the spokesperson uttered means if the DPRK meets the U.S. brigandish demand concerning the "human rights issue", it is possible to improve the DPRK-U.S. relations. 
					
					 This is nothing but an attempt to intensify the "human rights offensive" against the DPRK under the spurious signboard of improved relations. 
					
					 As the international community unanimously claims and censures, the "human rights issue" in the U.S. foreign policy is used as a lever for interfering in internal affairs of other countries and pressurizing them. 
					
					 The concern spelled out by the U.S. over the non-existent "human rights issue" of the DPRK cannot be interpreted otherwise than a subterfuge to intensify the interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK and pressure upon it.
					
					 The "human rights issue" in the DPRK much touted by the U.S. has never existed.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never allow the U.S. to bring down the inviolable socialist system under the pretence of "human rights issue."
					
					 By nature, the U.S. has neither qualification nor justification to talk about human rights as it is the chieftain of man-killing and human rights abuses. 
					
					 It is the U.S. which sets the most shameful human rights record in the world. It is condemned at home and abroad for being the world's worst human rights abuser due to its unpopular and inhuman domestic and foreign policies. 
					
					 The Korean people and the DPRK were always victims when the human rights issue was discussed between the DPRK and the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. is a criminal state and human rights abuser as it has systematically abused the human rights of the Korean people in the most inhuman manner.
					
					  The U.S. has mercilessly violated the vital rights of the Korean people and their right to existence through outrageous armed interference, genocide and persistent and harsh sanctions and blockade, regarding the dignified DPRK as a thorn in the flesh generation after generation.
					
					 If the U.S. truly regards the human rights issue as an important element for improving the DPRK-U.S. relations, it should immediately roll back its hostile policy of aggression towards the DPRK and, at the same time, improve its own human rights record, the poorest in the world. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to mind its serious human rights issues before taking issue with the "human rights issue" of someone.

articles.title: Fall of Lee Myung Bak Regime Inevitable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Fall of Lee Myung Bak Regime Inevitable: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The fall of the Lee Myung Bak regime of traitors is a necessity of history. The candlelights held high by the protesters in south Korea will burn up the group of traitors to ashes. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					 Owing to their despicable sycophantic and traitorous policy, the dignity and interests of the south Korean people are ruthlessly violated and their lives are put at peril, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The desire for independent reunification and reunification through alliance with the north that had grown strong in south Korea was chilled and the inter-Korean relations were brought back to the dark era of antagonism and confrontation. This is the catastrophic consequences entailed by the group of traitors' escalated confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 Hundreds of media persons with anti-government tendency were punished owing to the conservative authorities' fascist moves to put them under their control, the participants in candlelight demonstrations against the import of American beef were brutally suppressed by police gangsters and evacuees from Ryongsan who called for the guarantee of their right to existence were burned to death by police "commandoes," their grudge unsettled, in the last little over four years.  These facts go to clearly prove that traitor Lee is the heinous fascist dictator and brutal abuser of human rights.
					
					 Lee and his group wrested power with hypocritical pledges to recover economy and improve people's living, but they threw them away like a pair of worn-out sandals and ran the whole gamut of irregularities and corruption to amass their fortune.
					
					 It is quite natural for the south Korean people to resolutely turn out in a mass struggle under the slogan "Down with Lee Myung Bak regime!"

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on IHO to Restore Designation of East Sea of Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on IHO to Restore Designation of East Sea of Korea
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- International Hydrographic Organization (IHO) should fulfill its due responsibility and mission in restoring the designation of the East Sea of Korea, the only designation for the waters east of the Korean Peninsula, on the principle of impartiality, though belatedly.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday urges this in a bylined article.
					
					 The East Sea is a recognized designation as the Korean nation named it before any others and widely used it at home and abroad from the early period of human civilization, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan registered the East Sea of Korea as the "Sea of Japan" in the IHO in 1929 by taking advantage of its position as a suzerain state.
					
					 Japan's claim to unilaterally mark the sea between Korea and Japan as the "Sea of Japan" is no more than sheer sophism and brigandish logic in disregard of principled international practice governing the marking of seas.
					
					 Marking the East Sea of Korea as the "Sea of Japan" should have already been corrected as it was a product of the Japanese imperialists' policy of colonial rule over Korea and their moves for expansion.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan has persistently insisted on unilaterally marking the "Sea of Japan" while intensifying its moves to grab Tok Islets, pursuant to its hostile policy toward the DPRK and blinded by its territorial expansion, far from making any apology and reparation for the crimes it committed during its colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 In the new century Japan has more vociferously called for unilateral marking of the "Sea of Japan". It has become desperate in its moves to let the international community recognize the name of "Sea of Japan" by setting in motion its foreign ministry and embassies in various countries as well as various kinds of its publications, media and Internet websites with huge financial investment.
					
					 To properly settle the issue of marking the sea between Korea and Japan is not an issue related to the name of the sea. This is a serious issue related to the territorial integrity of Korea, a seagirt country, as it decides whether it protects sovereignty over all its territorial waters or not. 
					
					 The Korean people will never tolerate Japan's moves to change the designation for the East Sea of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 24th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us All Live and Struggle Like Heroes".
					 The work, published on May 15, 1988, comprehensively deals with the theoretical and practical issues arising in waging an all-people heroic struggle including the tradition of heroic struggle of the Korean people, its essence, and tasks and ways for all the people to live and struggle like heroes.
					
					 The article says heroism displayed by the Korean people and army in dedicating themselves to the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the prosperity of the country serves as a source of invincible strength of Songun Korea and a powerful driving force for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Loyalty to the party and the leader is the most vivid expression of heroism, ardent patriotic devotion is the bottom line of miracles and feats and faith in socialism is the spiritual source of heroic feats, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has become a country of heroes as it has a large unit of heroes boundlessly faithful to the party and the leader.
					
					 For the future! This valuable patriotic spirit ran through the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il, which the army and people of the DPRK deeply engraved in their minds.
					
					 Unshakable is the faith of the army and people of the DPRK to share their destiny with socialism to the end. They have waged a heroic struggle to decisively foil the political and military pressure of the imperialists, their reactionary ideological and cultural poisoning and psychological warfare. 
					
					 A final victory is in store for the service persons and people of the DPRK because they are defending socialism in a death-defying spirit, strong in idea and faith.

articles.title: DPRK's Sovereignty Is Not Something to Be Bargained: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK's Sovereignty Is Not Something to Be Bargained: Minju Joson 
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- These days the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea keeps letting loose a spate of rigmaroles that the DPRK's satellite launch is "a missile launch" and expenses for it would be enough to buy a lot of food, dancing to the tune of the U.S. pulling up the DPRK over its nuclear deterrence. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Lee group dared make such ridiculous remarks, regarding the sovereignty of the DPRK as something to be bargained. This is an intolerable provocation to its army and people.
					
					 The Lee group has offered all human and material resources for the preparations for a war against the DPRK, while covering as much upkeep for the U.S. troops in south Korea as it calls for. Being in such poor position, the group was shameless enough to let loose such rhetoric according to the U.S. scenario, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The U.S. is impertinent enough to urge the DPRK to "give up its nuclear development and rocket launch and improve the people's living," while taking issue with its moves to bolster nuclear deterrence and peaceful space development program. The U.S. is preaching that if the DPRK dismantles its nukes and suspends its missile launch, it will get some rewards. This is like a wolf asking sheep to live together on good terms. There are some people telling the DPRK to believe what the U.S. says, failing to see through its ulterior intention lurking behind its rhetoric. But, the Lee group of traitors intentionally echoes the U.S. trumpeting in a bid to do harm to fellow countrymen, though it is aware of such intention. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the sovereignty of the DPRK can never be bargained. The DPRK will continue to bolster up its capability for self-defence including nuclear deterrence and firmly protect its sovereignty no matter what others may say.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Japan of Stepping up Building of Offensive Military Muscle
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Japan of Stepping up Building of Offensive Military Muscle
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- A recent issue of the U.S. magazine Newsweek said Japan keeps in place escort warships "Hyuga" and "Ise" capable of carrying helicopters, each with its total length of 200 meters. They can be converted into aircraft carriers capable of carrying fighters and assault planes, if they are improved a bit.
					 Japan is building a large-size warship "22DDH" with a total length of 248 meters under the name of escort ship.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan's attempts to possess aircraft carriers and improve the quality of its naval force indicate that it is making a switchover in the building of its armed forces from their defensive nature to offensive one.
					
					 The present military hardware of Japan is on a relatively high level and an individual military field has reached a top level.
					
					 Japan is the second largest possessor of F-15 fighters next to the U.S. and has a high level of air operation capability in the Asia-Pacific region. Having Oyasio-class conventional submarines, Aegis-class destroyers and Osumi-class amphibious landing craft, Japan possesses naval forces putting advanced naval powers into the shade. It has begun emerging a military entity threatening the international community.
					
					 This is the reason why Japan is busy having access to aircraft carriers and introducing U.S. made fighters of the fifth generation. 
					
					 It is the scenario of Japan to emerge a military giant as early as possible and thus acquire the capability to invade other countries and set about launching a war of reinvasion.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that Japan remains unchanged in its ambition to invade other Asian countries and it is now posing a grave threat to peace and security in Asia.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Air Forces Stage Joint Air Search Drill
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Air Forces Stage Joint Air Search Drill
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Air forces of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet army Tuesday staged a joint combat search drill for a preemptive attack on the DPRK, according to south Korean MBC.
					 More than 50 aircraft including F-16, F-15K, F-5F, A-10 were involved in the exercise staged under the simulated conditions of an actual battle.
					
					 The commander of the U.S. 7th Air Force and the Operation Commander of the Air Force of the south Korean puppet army incited war hysteria aboard a plane.
					
					 The ceaseless saber-rattling being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces for surprise preemptive strikes at the DPRK is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Attempting to Conclude Military Agreements with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Attempting to Conclude Military Agreements with Japan
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- 73 organizations of national movement in south Korea including the Association of Men of Merit in the Movement for Independence issued a joint statement accusing the puppet authorities of getting frantic in their moves to conclude country-selling military agreements with Japan. 
					 The statement denounced the Lee Myung Bak regime for contemplating concluding the General Security of Military Information Agreement (GSOMIA) and an Acquisition and Cross-Servicing Agreement with Japan late in May.
					
					 It censured conservative media including Joson Ilbo for trumpeting about the projected conclusion of the agreements as if they had been waiting for it to take place.
					
					 Should Lee Myung Bak form a military alliance with Japan in the end, he will be recorded in history as a wicked traitor to the nation like Ri Wan Yong, it warned.
					
					 The members of the organizations of the national movement openly declare that they will strongly resist against the treacherous Lee regime at the risk of their lives, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Wiping out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Wiping out Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement on April 22 denouncing the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak for getting crazy with the moves for confrontation and war while seriously hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The Korean nation can neither expect national reconciliation and unity, the country's peace and reunification nor escape disaster unless it punishes the group of traitors without equals in the world who committed unspeakably hideous crimes and the thrice-cursed hoodlums with whom Koreans cannot live under the same sky, the statement said.
					
					 The Koreans in China will turn out as one in the just and patriotic sacred war to wipe out the Lee group of traitors, the sworn enemy, to the last man on this land and achieve the historic cause of the country's reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, the statement stressed.
					
					 The Federation of Korean Businessmen in China in a statement on April 27 called for dealing unimaginably deadly blows at the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak keen on escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The statement branded traitor Lee as human scum of the era who ceased to be a human being as he malignantly slandered the DPRK, far from congratulating compatriots on the significant holiday. 
					
					 The Youth Federation of Koreans in China in a statement on the same day said that it would never pardon the crimes the Lee group of traitors committed by repeatedly perpetrating provocations, while malignantly slandering the idea and system of compatriots.

articles.title: Time for U.S. to Normalize Ties with Pyongyang: Senior Fellow of Cato Research Institute of U.S.
articles.content:
Time for U.S. to Normalize Ties with Pyongyang: Senior Fellow of Cato Research Institute of U.S.
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- Ted Carpenter, senior fellow of the Cato Research Institute of the U.S., in an article dedicated to May 11 issue of the China Daily, Chinese English paper, proved the unreality and uselessness of the U.S. policy toward the DPRK.
					 The gist of the article is as follows:
					
					 U.S. leaders have painted themselves into a corner regarding policy toward north Korea. For more than two decades, Washington's strategy has been to offer Pyongyang a stark choice: give up its nuclear program or face ever-greater isolation from the international community. President Barack Obama was especially blunt about presenting that alternative to north Korea during his early weeks in office.
					
					 That approach clearly has not worked. Indeed, the Obama administration has created the risk of the worst possible outcome.
					
					 A new, radically different approach is needed. Instead of continuing the futile strategy of isolating north Korea, Washington should adopt a comprehensive strategy to normalize relations with Pyongyang.
					
					 The U.S. would need to offer a number of conciliatory measures. Perhaps the most important step is to change the atmosphere of unrelenting hostility between the two countries.
					
					 To reduce tensions, the Obama administration should offer to sign a non-aggression pact with north Korea. U.S. leaders should also propose a peace treaty formally ending the armed hostilities on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Obama administration should agree to establish formal diplomatic relations with north Korea. Washington needs to terminate its economic "cold war" against north Korea. The administration should commit to rescind most of the current U.S. economic sanctions on Pyongyang and to support the repeal of UN resolutions authorizing international economic sanctions.
					
					 The Obama administration would be taking some considerable policy and political risks to offer a new relationship to north Korea.
					
					 But it is evident that the current policy has not worked in the past, is not working now, and has little prospect of working in the future.
					
					 The bottom line is that Washington needs to adopt a bold alternative to the current strategy.
					
					 When a policy has been in place for decades and is producing utterly sterile results, it is sheer folly to advocate staying the course.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Carried by Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Carried by Bangladeshi Paper
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi paper Natun Katha on May 8 carried a detailed gist of the speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the military parade to mark the centenary of President Kim Il Sung's birth.
					 The speech made by him on April 15, 2012 said that the 100-year long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the iron truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of a country and nation. 
					
					 Clarified in the speech is an idea that the glorious 100-year long history of Juche Korea and the ever-lasting history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea are guaranteed by the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It indicated the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of Byelorussian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of Byelorussian Political Party
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Communist Workers' Party of Belarus on May 8 posted on its internet website the full text of the talk the dear respected Kim Jong Un had with the leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on April 6, 2012.
					 The talk is titled "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and   Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche."
					
					 The talk says that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the Korean revolution to hold General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever. It indicated the task for steadily developing the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Hailed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Hailed 
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea issued a statement on May 7 hailing the talk titled "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" the dear respected Kim Jong Un had with the leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the speech made by him at the military parade to mark the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Jong Un's works are important guidelines clearly indicating a bright future of a new century of Juche and militant programmes which not only the Korean people but all followers of the Juche idea in the world should always hold fast to, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK is sure to triumph as long as there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the great successor to Juche revolution and the excellent people who have remained loyal to their leaders generation after generation. 
					
					 The followers of Juche idea reiterated their will to earnestly study and disseminate the works of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, May 15 (KCNA) -- An organization and an institution of Peru issued statements on May 8 in support of the answer given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry denouncing the "joint statement" of the permanent members of the UNSC pulling up the DPRK over its launch of satellite for peaceful purposes and demanding it stop its nuclear activities and dismantle its nuclear deterrence.
					 The PeruvianKorean Institute of Culture and Friendship in a statement said that the propelling bodies for satellites the DPRK launched three times do not pose any problem in the sense that they carried satellites for peaceful purposes and scientific researches before arguing about whether they are rockets or missiles.
					
					 The statement refuted and denounced the "joint statement" issued by the permanent members of the UNSC in a bid to do harm to the DPRK and pressurize it and expressed support and solidarity with the DPRK in its satellite launch and measures to bolster its nuclear deterrent, the building of a thriving nation and the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru noted in a statement:
					
					 The world progressive forces which love justice and respect the sovereignty of the DPRK are rejecting and condemning the above-said "joint statement" as a violation of the right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once plugging the south Korean puppet clique and its lackeys and allies into an anti-DPRK campaign under an unreasonable pretext.

articles.title: MINREX desmiente rumor de "secuestro de norteamericano"
articles.content:
MINREX desmiente rumor de "secuestro de norteamericano"
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- En exclusiva concedida a la ACNC con motivo de que los reaccionarios japoneses estan induciendo en error la opinion publica circulando el falso rumor del "secuestro de norteamericano", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 15 la siguiente respuesta:
					  Ultimamente, una entidad japonesa vinculada con el supuesto "problema de secuestro" y las figuras politicas derechistas de Japon lanzan acaloradamente una sucia y pueril campana para acusar a la RPDC en el mismo tema.
					
					  El parlamentario del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon, Yamatani, ofrecio el 10 de mayo en Washington una conferencia de prensa y dijo que es posible que haya sido "secuestrado" por la RPDC un norteamericano desaparecido en 2004 durante sus estudios en China.
					
					  Esta mentira de punta a cabo constituye otro complot anti-RPDC.
					
					  Anteriormente, los reaccionarios japoneses habian sido criticados y ridiculizados por todo el mundo al revelarse el caracter fraudulento de su campana de vincular injustamente con la RPDC los casos de desaparicion reportados en el pais domestico.
					
					  Como si eso fuera poco, estan escenificando la misma payasada sacando esta vez el tema de extranjero secuestrado, lo cual hace recordar los ultimos movimientos desesperados de los psicopatas.
					
					  El "problema de secuestro" ya ha sido resuelto cabalmente gracias a los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC.
					
					  Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses siguen cuestionandolo y difunden ahora hasta el nuevo rumor de secuestro involucrando a otros paises, lo cual demuestra su fiebre conflictiva con la RPDC.
					
					  Cada vez que se tornaba inestable la situacion politica en su pais, los politiqueros derechistas de Japon solian recurrir a la campana anti-RPDC en el tema de secuestro para eludir la crisis al fomentar el chovinismo nacional y la hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					  Para ganar la popularidad, los politicos japoneses de la calana de Yamatani, quienes mantienen su vida politica colaborando con las entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC, no vacilan en ofrecerse como protagonistas de las sucias y pueriles farsas contra esta.
					
					  Los hombres del mundo escupen en la politica de Japon que no tiene razon y esta signada de hipocresia y artimanas.

articles.title: Enterrado cadaver de un martir en Corea
articles.content:
Enterrado cadaver de un martir en Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo enterrado en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos el cadaver de Hong Song Ryul, ex general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, quien realizo meritos en la lucha por el desarrollo de las fuerzas aereas coreanas.
					Hong puso de pleno manifiesto su valentia incomparable en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y en la lucha por la emancipacion del pueblo vietnamita y dedico todo lo suyo por apoyar con las fuerzas armadas la guia del Songun del Partido.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un aprecio mucho sus meritos heroicos e hizo enterrar al difunto en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en ese cementerio una ceremonia de enterrar el cadaver del martir Hong.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios interesados, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los familiares del difunto.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza acusacion del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza acusacion del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 15 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el vocero del Departamento de Estado de Estados Unidos dijo que "expresa preocupacion por el problema de derechos humanos en el Norte de Corea" y "este tema es un importante factor para la mejora de las relaciones entre Corea y EE.UU.".
					Es decir, se mejorarian las relaciones entre ambos paises si la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acepta la demanda bandidesca de EE.UU. en cuanto al "problema de DDHH".
					
					Esto no pasa de ser un intento de intensificar la "ofensiva de DDHH" contra la RPDC bajo el vistoso rotulo del mejoramiento de las relaciones.
					
					Como reconoce y repudia la sociedad internacional, el "problema de DDHH" es un instrumento de EE.UU. para intervenir y presionar a otros paises en virtud de su politica exterior.
					
					En la RPDC no existe siquiera el "problema de DDHH" que escandaliza EE.UU.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de ella no perdonaran jamas las tentativas de EE.UU. de atropellar el sagrado regimen socialista pretextando ese tema.
					
					Desde el principio, EE.UU., ejecutor no. 1 de masacres y violacion de DDHH, no tiene derecho ni justificacion para hablar de los DDHH.
					
					Debido a su politica exterior e interior de caracter antipopular e inmoral, el imperio es condenado por los nacionales y extranjeros como peor violador de DDHH.
					
					En esta materia, la RPDC y su pueblo siempre han sido la victima y EE.UU. viene violando sistematicamente los DDHH del pueblo coreano usando metodos mas inhumanitarios.
					
					Considerando de siglo en siglo a la digna RPDC como espina clavada en sus ojos, EE.UU. vino violando flagrantemente el derecho a vida y existencia del pueblo coreano mediante la intervencion armada, masacre, sancion y bloqueo.
					
					Si EE.UU. toma de veras el problema de DDHH como importante factor de la mejora de las relaciones bilaterales, debe cancelar de inmediato su agresiva politica hostil a la RPDC y mejorar su situacion de DDHH, la peor del mundo.
					
					Antes de cuestionar el problema de DDHH de alguien, EE.UU. debera lavarse sus manos que cometieron incontables crimenes de violacion de DDHH.
